They are actully hte Destron's but wehn calling them you call them as 
Destocons


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Scorpius (No last name)" <scorpiusis@h...> wrote:
> [What's going on here? There's no such faction as the Destrocons on 
the 
> character section.]
> 
> 
> >From: gunthers8@n...
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> >To: nbwrpg@y...
> >Subject: Re: Into the Destron's
> >Date: Sun, 29 Apr 2001 23:28:30 -0000
> >
> >::Halucigen::
> >Halucigen crawled through the small hole oblivious to the fact of a
> >drone near him.  He got inside and looked around. The place was
> >baron.  No one was around at all. He transformed to bot mode and
> >began to walk through the base.
> >"There must be someone here" he said as he pulled out his energy
> >pistol.
> >
> >--- In nbwrpg@y..., James T <t882hcc91@y...> wrote:
> > > Magmatron:
> > >
> > >      "Destrocons!" Magmatron called through the comm
> > > system. "I need you to go and scout about the Destron
> > > base in Syria, we will soon be making use of it, not
> > > anybody else."
> > >      Magmatron had noticed the damage to the base as
> > > he was attemting uplink with it. He had already sent a
> > > small drone to see what the damage was caused by, and
> > > in case it was another Transformer he wanted some
> > > flying firepower there to help with the unconsious
> > > making. "Do not destroy whatever is there, I want it
> > > operational."
> > >      He closed that comm and sent one to GuileDart
> > > privatly. "We may have use for your new machine soon
> > > enough, GuileDart, make whatever preperations you need."
> > >
